title: Practice-Centered Experiential Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Emphasizing language skills practically applied in office/administrative settings. Custom experiential activities reflecting learners' individual work contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately use professional terminology in context through role-playing based on real-world work scenarios
Learners can analyze language usage errors based on peer feedback and propose improvement strategies
Learners can record communication issues occurring in workplace settings using mobile devices and generate three or more solution strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
